<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 263, 218, 279]]<|/det|>
## MATHEMATICS  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 287, 196, 302]]<|/det|>
Paper 3 (Core)  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[675, 263, 861, 279]]<|/det|>
0580/32  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[675, 287, 861, 302]]<|/det|>
October/November 2020

2 hours  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 338, 374, 353]]<|/det|>
You must answer on the question paper.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 365, 380, 380]]<|/det|>
You will need: Geometrical instruments  

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 397, 218, 412]]<|/det|>
## INSTRUCTIONS  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 413, 275, 427]]<|/det|>
Answer all questions.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 428, 720, 443]]<|/det|>
Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 443, 767, 458]]<|/det|>
Write your name, centre number and candidate number in the boxes at the top of the page.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 458, 536, 473]]<|/det|>
Write your answer to each question in the space provided.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 473, 457, 488]]<|/det|>
Do not use an erasable pen or correction fluid.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 488, 343, 502]]<|/det|>
Do not write on any bar codes.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 502, 457, 517]]<|/det|>
You should use a calculator where appropriate.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 518, 316, 532]]<|/det|>
You may use tracing paper.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 533, 450, 547]]<|/det|>
You must show all necessary working clearly.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 548, 814, 578]]<|/det|>
Give non-exact numerical answers correct to 3 significant figures, or 1 decimal place for angles in degrees, unless a different level of accuracy is specified in the question.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 578, 465, 592]]<|/det|>
For \(\pi\) , use either your calculator value or 3.142.  

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[87, 619, 208, 633]]<|/det|>
## INFORMATION
